resources.string: Use the credit simulator to help you understand how your data affects your credit score.

In order to generate your credit score, Begini is requesting the following permissions:\
Location

We study locational activity. This helps us estimate with a fair level of accuracy your most visited locations. We use this as a signal for building your credit score. 


Calendar Events
Having access to calendar events helps us determine how busy you are. We use this as a signal for building your credit score.
This will take a few minutes.\nPlease wait...
We study locational activity. This helps us estimate with a fair level of accuracy your most visited locations. We use this as a signal for building your credit score.
Having access to calendar events helps us determine how busy you are. We use this as a signal for building your credit score.

We access your contacts details to determine a list of people you socialise with. This data helps us to then build a social graph to assist with your credit score. We will only use this data for your personal score and we will not contact any of these people in your contact list.

We use read access to Photos to extract geo-location information from image files. This helps us estimate with a fair level of accuracy your most visited locations. We use this as a signal for building your credit score.
In order to generate your credit score, Begini is requesting the following permissions:
All your personal information is kept 100% secure. Do you want to allow the permissions?
GPS is disabled in your device. Would you like to enable it?
Hi, the app can not work without storage permission. Please go to app settings and enable storage permission.
Can not connect with internet. Please turn on network and try again.
Your data analysis completed. Scores will be shared with your bank. Please go back.
